Package ntnu.idatt2001.ejhaslerjorgfi.ui.controllers

Class StoryController

java.lang.Object
ntnu.idatt2001.ejhaslerjorgfi.ui.controllers.StoryController
@Deprecated public class StoryController extends Object
Deprecated.
because it was not used in latest version, but left here to demonstrate understanding of the technology. The final approach of the application bases itself on combining view- and controller-components in a single module. The developers thinks that this satisfies the princple of Responsibility-Driven Design.

StoryController

Controller class responsible for the handling events and functionality related to the Story which are being played. Amongst others, it is responsible for reading from *.paths files, returning observable Lists and to add and remove elements from those lists.

Since:
01.03.2023
Version:
06.03.2023
Author:
Group 24
